message.content:
1. Soft tissue parameters were recorded.
2. The soft tissue parameters include modified plaque index (mPI).
3. The soft tissue parameters include modified bleeding index (mBI).
4. The soft tissue parameters include papillary index (PPI).
5. The soft tissue parameters include marginal level of soft tissue (ML).
6. The soft tissue parameters include width of keratinized mucosa (WKM).
7. The parameters were recorded at baseline.
8. The parameters were recorded on Day 60.
9. The parameters were recorded on Day 120.
10. The parameters were recorded on Day 180.

messages.content:
Statement: All soft tissue parameters i.e., modified plaque index (mPI), modified bleeding index (mBI), papillary index (PPI), marginal level of soft tissue (ML) and width of keratinized mucosa (WKM) were recorded at baseline, Day 60, Day 120 and Day 180.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
